description: Factor level shows no lime applied
Factor level shows low lime treatment. No lime applied 1876-1904. Lime applied two or four times, 1905-1918, Plots 2aii, 8aii and 8bii.
Factor level shows medium lime treatment. No lime applied 1876-1897. Applied once or twice in 1898-1924, plots 2bi and 5b
Factor level shows high lime treatment. No lime applied 1876-1897. Applied in 1898 and 1905, plot 2bii
